content: pattern legend knit 25 skl kfb 20 slip k/tb 15 10 5 1 30 25 20 15 10 5 1 4 foot knit length of foot the length of the foot can be customized by changing how many rounds knitted the foot should stop 2 5 inches before the end of your foot try your sock on as you work to get correct length i completed 50 rounds your total rounds _____________ needles t/b k30 heel flap extending the sole total rounds 25 the heel flap extends to the end of your heel pad and creates the bottom of the sock sole you will be using slip stitches to reenforce the heel this section is worked only on needle b a round here is defined as going across only needle b 1 rounds 1-24 needle b row 1 row 2 x 12 row 1 ws sl1p/wyif p across turn row 2 rs sl1p/wyib k1 x 15 2 round 25 needle b ws sl1p/wyif p across turn heel turn turning the sock up total rounds 13 this heel turn uses german short row and is worked only on needle b the stitches decrease from 30 to 18 1 round 1 rs sl1p/wyib k1 x 8 k1 ssk k1 turn 2 round 2 ws sl1p/ wyif p5 p2tog p1 turn double check your work for 10 loops on the outsides of the 2 gaps you created 3 round 3-12 row 1 row 2 x 5 row 1 rs sl1p/wyib k1 sl1p/wyib till 1 before gap ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1p/wyif p till 1 before the gap p2tog p1 turn 4 round 13 rs sl1p k17 5 gusset picking up & decreasing to 30 stitches total rounds 17 you will start working in the round to form the gusset 1 using needle b pick up 14 sts on the heel flap 2 swap last st on needle b with first st on needle t needle b original stitch is on the outside of the cross 3 round 1 needle t k till 1 st left slide last stitch onto cabling needle pick up 1st st on the heel flap with needle t place stich from cable needle onto needle t picked up stitch from heel flap is on the outside of the cross pick up 13 more sts needle b k18 k13/tbl k1 ***check that all picked up stitches are on needle b there should be 46 sts on needle b and 30 sts on needle t *** 4 on needle b place sm after 8 sts and 38 sts 5 round 2 needle t k until 1 st k1/tbl needle b k8/tb sm k1 sl1p x 15 sm k till 3 k2tog k1 note if your stiches are twisted knit through back loop 6 round 3-12 row 1 row 2 x 5 row 1 needle t k all needle b k1 ssk k till sm sm k30 sm k across row 2 needle t k all needle b k till
